overview: After developing a minor crush on her freshman mathematics teacher, Robert Lee, Daiyu a sixteen year old high school student,falls into a deep love cycle and goes through the heartbreak, anticipation, and pain of believing that she will one day reunite with him. Ready for this love, Daiyu embarks on a love journey across the world to find the key to fighting the shadow figures and lurking enemies ready to do whatever it takes to keep them apart.
title: The Rare Flame
